derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French plurel or Latin pluralis, from plus, plur- 'more'

encyclopedia.content: plural KK: [] DJ: [] a. 1. 【语】复数的 Data is a plural noun. "Data"是一个复数名词。 2. 由两个以上的人锛埢蛭镲級组成的；多元的 n.【语】 1. 复数[U] 2. 复数形式锛埖拇曙級[C] The plural of a noun is usually made by adding -s to the singular. 名词复数通常以单数加-s构成。 plural adj. 【语】复数的， 多于一个的 由复数组成的， 包含复数的 a plural noun 复数名词 plural livings 【宗】兼俸 plural m

entry.def: The plural form of a word is the form that is used when referring to more than one person or thing.

example.ex: 'Data' is the Latin plural form of 'datum'.
example.tran: data 在拉丁文中是 datum 的复数形式。
他对复数代词 we 的使用

entry.def: The plural of a noun is the form of it that is used to refer to more than one person or thing.

example.tran: person 的复数形式是什么？

entry.def: A plural society or system involves different kinds of people.

example.ex: Britain is a plural society in which the secular predominates...
example.tran: 英国是个世俗主导的多元社会。

example.ex: His government has pledged to move the country towards a plural democracy.
example.tran: 他的政府已承诺要推动本国朝着多元民主的方向发展。

means.word_mean: 1. the form of a word that is used to denote more than one
1. grammatical number category referring to two or more items or units

auth_sentence.content: The plural can also be spelt 'plateaux'.

sentences.en: Here you should use plural pronoun.
sentences.cn: 这里你应该用复数代词。

sentences.en: A plural marriage is forbidden by many countries.
sentences.cn: 一夫多妻, 一妻多夫制被许多国家禁止。
